Change temperature unit from Celsius to: Change temperature unit from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Change the password to access the dashbo: Change the password to access the dashboard
Changing the password will lock the dash: Changing the password will lock the dashboard. You will need to use the new password to unlock it.
Clicking the button your system will sca: Clicking the button your system will scan for available wifi networks. Be aware that connecting to a Wifi network you will need to connect to the new Wifi IP address you have to find in your LAN.
Connect your system controller to a Wifi: Connect your system controller to a Wifi instead using ethernet
Create a backup file of dashboard, miner: Create a backup file of dashboard, miner and pools configurations
In ECO mode your miner will consume less: In ECO mode your miner will consume less power (about <0>1.0W/MHs</0>) but its hashrate will be slower. This mode is recommende if you want have less noise and less possible to overheat your miner.
In Turbo mode your miner will consume mo: In Turbo mode your miner will consume more power (about <0>1.4W/MHs</0>) and so its hashrate will be faster. This mode is good to gain the maximum profit but you need to take care of possible overheat.
In custom mode you can control frequency: In custom mode you can control frequency and voltage of your miner for your specific needs. This mode is for expert users and is not recommended if you don't know what you are doing. You could harm your miner.
Keep left sidebar open or closed by defa: Keep left sidebar open or closed by default
Keep right sidebar open or closed by def: Keep right sidebar open or closed by default
Manage pools configuration for your mine: Manage pools configuration for your miner
Reset all configurations to factory defa: Reset all configurations to factory default
Restore all configurations from a backup: Restore all configurations from a backup file
There are no wifi networks available yet: There are no wifi networks available yet. Please click the scan button to look at them.
Use this tools to backup, restore and re: Use this tools to backup, restore and reset configurations
You need to restart your miner to apply: You need to restart your miner to apply changes.
